education.description: In addition to completing coursework in the physical and biological sciences, I played saxophone in multiple school bands, worked on the Urban Farm, and prepared lecture demonstrations for Chemistry courses.
Carried out research on methods for improving teaching practice in a collaborative team, with a focus on student paired learning and empathy.
Dev Bootcamp is a 19-week intensive training program for web developers, rooted in learning full stack development skills and empathetic team cooperation.
